attributes.action: Raise the issue of North Korean concentration camps with Parliament and do all he can within the party to raise awareness of the condition of the North Korean people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are currently an estimated 500,000 people being starved, tortured, raped, murdered and even gassed in gulags across North Korea. 

Organisations like LiNK (Liberty in North Korea) have collected testimonies from former inmates and prison guards about the extent of the abuse. These are men, women and children who are completely innocent of any crime. The North Korean penal system works on the principle that if one person speaks ill of the State or the Dear Leader, then 3 generations of his/her family must be purged (to root out the 'seed of dissidence').

Former guards have spoken of gas chambers in which entire families are murdered as scientists record their findings.

These camps can be seen quite clearly on Google Earth - we are all witnesses.
